alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Humphreys; Leflore; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 8:17PM CDT until September 06 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Holmes County in central Mississippi... Southwestern Leflore County in north central Mississippi... North central Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Humphreys County in central Mississippi... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 817 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Belzoni, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Thornton around 820 PM CDT. Tchula around 825 PM CDT. Tolarville and Howard around 830 PM CDT. Eden and Coxburg around 835 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
